head_description: "Negatively charged sub atomic particle that revolves around the nucleus.","A covalent bond formed when two atoms share a pair of electrons.","A chemical bond between two atoms in which one atom donates an electron and another accepts the electron.","Ions are charged atoms which have either gained or lost electrons.","The smallest components of an element having  unique properties.","The octet rule states that elements gain or lose electrons to attain an electron configuration of the nearest noble gas."
